DOC.criteria: Age 3055 year BMI 1945 kg/m2 Anemia ( female subject hemoglobin < 11 g/dl male subject hemoglobin < 12 g/dl ) Active coronary artery disease history unstable macrovascular disease ( unstable angina , myocardial infarction , stroke , revascularization coronary , peripheral carotid artery within 3 month recruitment ) Renal insufficiency/failure ( serum creatinine > 1.5mg/dl ) Oral warfarin group medication history blood clot disorder . Pregnancy breastfeed Alcohol consumption great 2 glasses/day substance abuse Untreated uncontrolled thyroid disorder Debilitating chronic disease ( discretion investigator )
